title: Binance price outlook: Can BNB break out of the $400–$800 range?
body: Binance continues to trade sideways in a tightly defined high time frame range, with $800 as resistance and $400 as support. As this range matures, the likelihood of a major breakout, or breakdown, increases. Until then, traders should prepare for continued oscillation and plan around key levels. Binance ( BNB ) has been consolidating for weeks, and the structure shows no signs of an immediate breakout. However, the ongoing sideways action is setting the stage for a larger volatility expansion in the near future once resistance or support breaks. Key technical points Range High: $800 resistance with deviation and rejection confirmed Range Low: $400 support, aligning with the 200 MA and 0.618 Fibonacci retracement Rotational Structure: Price action has respected both edges of the range, creating a clear oscillation pattern BNBUSDT (1W) Chart, Source: TradingView The $800 region is acting as a strong resistance level, with price failing to close convincingly above it. A clear deviation from this level has already occurred, confirming a rejection and a rotation back into the mid-range. This resistance aligns with the value area high and sits just above the 0.618 Fibonacci retracement, both adding to its technical significance. You might also like: Musk’s X to offer investment and trading in ‘super app’: report If price continues to reject around this high time frame resistance, the probability increases for a full range rotation back to the $400 support. This support is a key technical zone, it coincides with the 200-day moving average and another 0.618 Fibonacci level, and it also holds untapped liquidity built over the past several months. A test of this area would offer a clean sweep of downside liquidity, potentially setting the stage for a stronger bullish reaction. BNB remains firmly within a rotational range structure, and no breakout has yet occurred. For long-term investors and swing traders, the optimal long opportunity likely lies near the $400 mark, should price revisit that level with confirmation. Until then, entering mid-range positions carries unnecessary risk. What to expect in the coming price action Unless BNB breaks above $800 or loses the $400 support, price is expected to continue ranging. Traders should focus on the edges of the range for positioning, with $400 acting as the ideal accumulation zone and $800 as the breakout trigger. Until a clear shift in structure appears, range-bound strategies remain favorable. Read more: Polkadot price drops to a key level: Can DOT surge 225%?

title: MT5 Download: Unlocking Multi-Asset Trading For The Digital Age
body: As someone who knows what the crypto world is all about, it’s natural that you’re starting to consider branching out and looking at other markets. Multi-asset trading allows you to profit from multiple positions in multiple markets, and all in a way that can diversify your portfolio and intelligently minimize your risk exposure.What you need is a next-generation platform that offers flexibility across a variety of different asset classes. If you haven’t already explored it for yourself, MT5 offers everything you are looking for. Get Started With MT5Many skilled traders and tech-savvy entrepreneurs use MT5 because of the unique combination of flexibility, versatility, and analytical power that it brings to the table. Because you are moving onto a platform that is so much more than a training aid for novice traders, you will be able to quickly build a robust multi-asset portfolio that allows you to adapt to rapidly changing market conditions.You can find a reputable MT5 download with the click of a button and then use it as a gateway to start trading everything from crypto and forex to stocks, indices, and commodities. The key point is that you will have the freedom to choose what you trade and which markets you want to enter, allowing you to build a portfolio that manages your risk exposure exactly as you wish.Unlock Multi-Asset TradingOne of the most flexible options that MT5 offers from a multi-asset point of view is the option to set up CFD positions on things like stocks, forex, and indices. You can also do the same thing if you’re trading precious metals or commodities. Although many traders will tell you that there is greater risk exposure when taking a CFD position, there is also the potential for a higher level of return.Because MT5 allows you to trade multiple assets on a single platform, you can offset some of your higher-risk positions with more stable, longer-term options. This will then allow you to diversify your portfolio so that no one big swing in a local market can have a significant impact on the amount of trading capital you still have access to.MetaTrader 5’s Advanced FunctionalityYou can use established names like ThinkMarkets to quickly explore the wide array of highly detailed analysis tools and powerful charting options. While all of the basics, such as moving averages and standard deviation spreads, are there, so too is a comprehensive range of technical indicators. Using them to provide you with real-time alerts when key shifts occur in the market will allow you to react faster than other traders and profit as a result.MT5’s range of charting tools is also considerably more advanced than the commonly used MT4 platform. Combine this with the fact that you now have the potential to trade half a dozen or more asset classes, and you will see that you have far more options simply by switching to a more advanced platform.Algorithmic Trading With MT5Automated trades triggered by a pre-defined algorithm allow you to react virtually instantly to rapidly changing market conditions. In a world where being first matters perhaps more than any other, traders are increasingly switching from traditional manual trades to smarter, faster, and more precise algorithmic trades . The result is a massive increase in the potential trading volume that you can achieve, and it’s an increase that you can then easily scale across every market and asset class you want to trade.Expert Advisors (EAs) are trading bots that can be forensically backtested and then optimized on the platform because MT5 provides comprehensive support for algorithmic trading. Many savvy traders also use the MT5 platform to run historical data from real markets through their trading bots to check that the algorithms that are driving them are functioning as expected. This becomes especially important when you want to be able to make sure that you enter a new market with your setup fully optimized for the initial starting conditions.Utilizing Depth Of Market AnalysisDepth of Market is one of the most powerful analysis tools MT5 offers. It is designed to provide you with a comprehensive overview of the market at any given time and includes a clear visual display of ask and bid prices across the full range of different trading volumes. The idea here is to give you a greater level of understanding of the market at the time you come to execute a trade, allowing you to take a more nuanced approach to risk management.By looking at the order book of your asset of choice in great detail, you can assess both the liquidity of the market and the potential for sudden changes in pricing trends. This makes MT5 a powerful platform for smart traders who want to move beyond the limits of rudimentary analysis and start to quantify key market metrics in real time.MetaTrader 5 Order TypesThe more order types you have at your disposal, the more potential you have to secure a higher level of return from any given market. MT5 offers market orders, pending orders, and stop orders. While some will argue that these are all fundamental, the combination of these types of orders with an in-depth range of analysis tools is what sets MT5 apart, in the opinion of many successful traders.Being able to quickly set stops and limits across multiple asset classes, and with the benefit of detailed analysis, provides a clear competitive advantage. You can then make use of a range of different execution modes so that you can adopt a variety of different trading styles to suit the current behavior of any given market. Execution options such as instant, market, exchange, and request provide you with the full range of flexibility that allows you to instantly adapt.Additional MetaTrader 5 FunctionalityThere are three additional features that allow MT5 users to function at a consistently high level compared to traders who use more rudimentary platforms: Integrated Accounting Systems: The options to use both netting and hedging systems allow every trader to manage their positions however they wish, and all while minimizing risk across multiple assets and markets Real-World Economic Calendar: The seamless integration of a highly accurate real-world calendar allows you to monitor external events that may result in market turmoil or pricing volatility One-Click Trading Options: The timely execution of potentially lucrative trades with a single click makes sure that technical issues and operating habits never stand in the way of being able to adopt a winning positionIntegrating these powerful tools into your wider approach to multi-asset trading will streamline how you approach building and diversifying your trading portfolio. Good news for those savvy traders out there who want to be able to manage risk and reward in an intelligent way for many years to come.The MetaTrader 5 Strategy TesterTesting multi-asset strategies with real-world data and historical data becomes seamless when you adopt MT5 as your trading platform of choice. The ability to feed data into your algorithms and run through strategies in detail without risking real capital is a priceless advantage in the trading world. The fact that you can do it within the same platform you will eventually be trading live on is another advantage, as it streamlines your testing and execution cycles.Multiple threads can be backend tested in detail to make sure that all elements and components of the trading algorithm are behaving as expected when fed market data. Being able to fine-tune and refine your limits and stops will allow you to execute smarter trades automatically. Many MT5 users find that periodically retesting their algorithms in this way helps them to continually evolve so that they don’t remain static in a world where so many others are choosing to be dynamic. The built-in Strategy Tester tool allows you to take a proactive approach to developing your trading algorithms with the minimum of effort.The Last WordMoving from a purely crypto portfolio into a multi-asset position will help you to diversify, manage risk, and secure revenue from a variety of different streams. You will also find that learning about new markets and how they behave offers clearer insights into crypto price fluctuations. Exactly what’s needed when you want to be able to adopt a rounded approach to trading that allows you to remain two steps ahead of the crowd.Take a closer look at MT5 today and start exploring the advanced analytical tools that it has to offer.

title: CZ Calls for ‘Will Function’ to Secure Crypto Legacy Amid Inheritance Concerns
body: Binance founder Changpeng Zhao (CZ) is urging crypto platforms to introduce a “will function.” This is to address the growing need for reliable inheritance systems in the digital assets space. Community Concerns In a statement shared on X, CZ said, “Every platform should have a ‘will function’—so that when someone is no longer around, their assets can be distributed to designated accounts according to specified proportions.” The ex-Binance CEO also called on regulators to allow minors to hold crypto accounts that can receive payments but not trade. According to him, this would allow children to legally get digital assets left behind by family members. He emphasized that while inheritance is a sensitive topic, “it’s a feature everyone who has assets on a platform will need once.” The conversation started with a post from Web3 community builder cryptobraveHQ, who referenced a tweet they had made in April. The crypto commentator pointed out that over $1 billion worth of crypto assets are transferred to centralized exchanges each year due to accidental deaths. He explained that many traders either don’t inform their families about their holdings or fail to share details such as the number of assets or platforms they use. As a result, when these users pass away unexpectedly, their accounts become inactive, and the exchanges then end up getting their digital assets. Binance’s Emergency Contacts and Inheritance Feature In response to the raised issues, Binance rolled out an “emergency contacts and inheritance heir” feature on June 12. The update enables users to designate emergency contacts and submit an application if their account becomes inactive for an extended period or in the event of death. This allows people to choose in advance who may be eligible to get their crypto holdings. Once the set inactivity threshold is reached and the user remains unresponsive, the exchange will contact the emergency contacts listed. If verification is successful, those individuals can begin the inheritance claim process. Competitors like Coinbase and BitGo are using more traditional methods to handle crypto estate planning. The former requires heirs to provide legal documents like death certificates and wills. This process is manual and does not include any in-app beneficiary settings. The latter uses multi-signature wallets, cold storage protocols, and customizable access controls to support inheritance. This is done through legal third-party partnerships. Meanwhile, Binance is also leading in Proof of Reserves (POR) reporting by releasing its disclosures monthly and on time. A new CryptoQuant report revealed that the exchange ranked first in transparency and consistently maintains a reserve coverage level above 100%. The post CZ Calls for ‘Will Function’ to Secure Crypto Legacy Amid Inheritance Concerns appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Ethereum: Why Joseph Lubin Predicts L1 Will Be the World’s Master Ledger
body: BitcoinWorld Ethereum: Why Joseph Lubin Predicts L1 Will Be the World’s Master Ledger Imagine a single, globally accessible, and immutable record-keeping system that serves as the foundational layer for finance, identity, supply chains, and countless other critical functions worldwide. This isn’t science fiction; it’s the vision articulated by Ethereum co-founder Joseph Lubin for the future role of the Ethereum Layer-1 (L1) network. In a recent statement shared on X, Lubin laid out a compelling case for why he believes Ethereum is uniquely positioned to become the world’s master ledger . What Makes Ethereum Suitable as a Master Ledger? Joseph Lubin’s perspective hinges on the inherent properties of the Ethereum network. He highlighted several key characteristics that he believes make Ethereum an ideal candidate for this monumental role: Permissionless: Anyone, anywhere, can inspect the ledger, use its functionalities, and add data or applications without needing special permission from a central authority. This open access is fundamental to a truly global system. Credibly Neutral: The network itself does not favor any particular user or application. Rules are enforced by code and consensus, not by potentially biased intermediaries. Censorship-Resistant: Once data or transactions are recorded on the Ethereum blockchain, it is incredibly difficult, if not impossible, for any single entity to remove or alter them. This resistance to censorship is crucial for maintaining the integrity of a global ledger. Tamper-Resistant & Tamper-Evident: Thanks to its consensus mechanism (Proof-of-Stake) and features like slashing (penalizing malicious behavior), attempting to tamper with the ledger is economically unfeasible and immediately visible to the entire network. The transparency of the blockchain ensures that any attempt at foul play is evident. Decentralized Structure: Ethereum is not controlled by a single company or government. Its operation is distributed across thousands of nodes run by diverse participants globally. This decentralization is key to its resilience and neutrality. These qualities, deeply embedded in the blockchain technology that powers Ethereum , paint a picture of a robust and trustworthy foundation upon which a global ledger could be built. The Role of Decentralization in the Master Ledger Vision Lubin placed significant emphasis on Ethereum ‘s continually strengthening decentralized structure. He described it as being overseen by “a best-in-class giant community.” This active and engaged community of developers, validators, researchers, and users is vital. They act as vigilant guardians, constantly monitoring the network, proposing improvements, and ensuring its health and security. The power of this decentralized community lies in its distributed nature. No single point of failure exists, and collusion becomes exponentially harder as the network grows and becomes more distributed. This collective oversight is a core reason why Ethereum can maintain its permissionless and censorship-resistant properties, essential for a global master ledger . Addressing Challenges: Patient, Well-Resourced Actors It’s not all smooth sailing, of course. Lubin acknowledged that there are “patient, well resourced actors” who consistently attempt to disrupt the Ethereum system. These could be malicious entities, competing interests, or even state-level adversaries who see a decentralized , neutral global ledger as a threat to existing power structures. However, Lubin expressed confidence that it will become increasingly difficult for these actors to succeed as Ethereum continues to grow and evolve. The network’s increasing decentralization, coupled with ongoing security improvements and the vigilance of its community, creates a powerful defense mechanism. The more participants, the more nodes, the more distributed the validation power, the more resilient the network becomes against attacks or disruption attempts. Why a Global Master Ledger Matters The concept of a global master ledger powered by blockchain technology has profound implications. Think about the current state of global record-keeping. Data is fragmented across countless databases, controlled by various entities, often incompatible, and susceptible to single points of failure or censorship. A unified, transparent, and immutable ledger could revolutionize: Global Finance: Enabling faster, cheaper, and more transparent cross-border payments and settlements. Facilitating widespread access to financial services ( Decentralized Finance or DeFi). Identity Management: Creating secure, self-sovereign digital identities that users control, reducing reliance on centralized identity providers. Supply Chain Management: Providing verifiable, end-to-end tracking of goods, increasing transparency and trust. Data Integrity: Ensuring the authenticity and immutability of critical data, from academic records to legal documents. Joseph Lubin’s vision places Ethereum L1 at the heart of this future, providing the fundamental layer of trust and truth upon which these applications can be built. The Path Forward for Ethereum L1 Achieving the status of the world’s master ledger is an ambitious goal that requires continued development and scaling. While Ethereum L1 provides the security and decentralization base, Layer 2 scaling solutions (like rollups) are crucial for handling the massive transaction volume required for global adoption. The ongoing evolution of Ethereum , driven by its community, focuses on improving efficiency, scalability, and sustainability. Joseph Lubin ‘s comments serve as a powerful reminder of the long-term aspirations for the network he helped create. It’s a vision that goes far beyond simply being a platform for cryptocurrencies or NFTs; it’s about building a fundamental piece of global digital infrastructure. Conclusion: Ethereum’s Audacious Ambition Joseph Lubin ‘s assertion that Ethereum L1 is poised to become the world’s master ledger is a bold statement, yet one grounded in the core principles and ongoing development of the network. Its permissionless, neutral, censorship-resistant, and decentralized nature, underpinned by robust blockchain technology , makes it a strong contender for hosting the foundational data layer of the future. While challenges remain from persistent adversaries, the network’s growing resilience and dedicated community are powerful counterforces. The journey to becoming the global master ledger is ongoing, but the vision articulated by Lubin highlights the profound potential and audacious ambition driving the Ethereum ecosystem. To learn more about the latest Ethereum trends, explore our articles on key developments shaping Ethereum decentralized finance and technology. title: Bitcoin Price Prediction: BTC Hits $104K as Ohio Passes Tax Break and Kraken Adds Staking
body: Bitcoin (BTC) is at $104,341 with a $39.9B daily volume. The market is consolidating, but momentum is building. As state-level crypto policies evolve and DeFi integration grows, the foundations for a price breakout are being laid. The circulating supply of BTC is getting close to 19.88M, and scarcity is a bullish driver. However, beyond supply and demand theory, real-world catalysts are providing traders with new reasons to remain long. Ohio Passes $200 Bitcoin Tax Break, Eyes Senate Vote The Ohio House of Representatives has just passed the Blockchain Basics Act (68–26), providing new protections for crypto users and miners. $200 tax exemption on capital gains for crypto transactions Ban on interference with self-custody wallets Mining protection from discriminatory zoning laws If passed by the Senate, Ohio would lead U.S. states in progressive crypto regulation. This clarity is bullish; it reduces friction for adoption and provides a model for others to follow. Ohio's HB 116 advances with unanimous 13-0 vote in the House Tech Committee. It protects self-custody, mining, and introduces a first-in-the-nation #Bitcoin tax exemption on purchases under $200. pic.twitter.com/d7C1D4NcO1 — TFTC (@TFTC21) June 17, 2025 Miners, developers, and retail traders are likely to benefit from the more favorable legal landscape, which could drive Bitcoin demand over time. Kraken Launches Native Bitcoin Staking via Babylon In a notable move for BTCFi (a Bitcoin-based DeFi platform), Kraken has partnered with Babylon Labs to offer native Bitcoin staking, with no wrapping, bridging, or lending required. AND. WE’RE. LIVE It's time to join the Bitcoin Staking Revolution Babylon Testnet, the first ever Trustless Native Bitcoin Staking protocol, is now officially live! Get involved, stake Signet #BTC and claim your free Pioneer Pass now. https://t.co/kdBgiu12Fq pic.twitter.com/l0eZTmZzev — Babylon (@babylonlabs_io) February 28, 2024 Using Babylon’s protocol, users can stake BTC and earn BABY tokens while their funds are secured on the Bitcoin network itself. This has several bullish implications: Reduces the circulating BTC supply, providing long-term price support Shows BTC utility beyond store of value Institutional BTCFi participation grows the ecosystem liquidity As more Bitcoin is locked for staking and institutions explore yield strategies, BTC’s role in decentralized finance is maturing rapidly. Bitcoin Technical Setup: Triangle Apex Nears $105K On the 2-hour chart, BTC is coiling within a classic ascending triangle, forming higher lows with horizontal resistance near $105,000. The 50-EMA at $105,252 acts as a dynamic ceiling. Bitcoin Price Chart – Source: Tradingview Momentum indicators suggest a breakout may be imminent. Trade setup to watch: Entry: Break above $105,500 with a strong candle Targets: $107,200, then $108,351 Stop-loss: Below trendline at $103,400 MACD: Flat, awaiting confirmation Candlesticks: Multiple doji and spinning tops near resistance Bottom Line: BTC is consolidating at a critical resistance zone, while real-world catalysts, like regulatory clarity and staking innovation, boost confidence. A breakout above $105,500 could trigger a fresh leg higher in Bitcoin’s 2025 bull run. title: Massive Milestone for Pi Network: Here’s What All Pioneers Need to Know
body: TL;DR After years of development, which included numerous delays and growing skepticism, Pi Network’s Open Network finally saw the light of day earlier this year. The team behind the project celebrated the first 100 days and outlined some of the most substantial developments in the ecosystem since its launch. The First 100 Days It was just over four months ago when the Core Team finally announced the official launch of the Open Network following numerous delays in the past few years. The congratulatory blog post from the team published earlier today highlighted the achievement and described the first (over) 100 days as successful since “Pi’s ecosystem and utilities have continued to benefit Pioneers and expand.” One of the most notable developments that came to life since the Open Network release was the launch of Pi Network Ventures – a $100 million investment initiative aimed at allocating funds into startups and businesses that want to advance the utility and adoption of Pi. “By investing in startups and businesses, Pi seeks to empower developers, many of whom build, integrate, and innovate with Pi, and bring real-world utility. Pi Network Ventures investments seek out innovators that are focused on globally accessible, community-driven, and economically meaningful projects.” The post further outlined the new apps available to users, as well as the introduction of new games and their increasing adoption. Separately, the Core Team praised the Pi Day 2025 event, which took place from March 14 to March 21 and was the first PiFest after the Open Network launch. The team claimed that more than 125,000 registered sellers (and 58,000 active ones) were involved, while the reviews were north of 45,000. The post also praised the recent introduction of .pi Domains Auction, which is a platform-level utility that “harnesses the collective resources of the Pi community.” It states that more than 123,000 active bids have already been placed by 57,000 unique users, while bidders have allocated over three million Pi tokens in the process. Network Achievements and Metrics Although it was officially launched just over 100 days ago and its native token (Pi) became available for trading at the same time, the project has existed for over half a decade, and users were able to mine the underlying cryptocurrency. As such, many of them had amassed Pi token fortunes in the past several years, and more than 7.4 billion coins have been migrated (5.2 billion locked and 2.2 billion unlocked) since February. The active nodes have exceeded 400,000, while the total number of migrated Pioneers to the Mainnet since Open Network’s launch is more than three million. The total Mainnet users is up to 13 million, the Core Team claimed. The post also encourages all Pioneers, devs, and businesses to “continue engaging and creating on Pi,” which will push “the network to continue its achievements that benefit the entire ecosystem.” The post Massive Milestone for Pi Network: Here’s What All Pioneers Need to Know appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Dogecoin (DOGE) and Solana (SOL) Unlikely to Repeat 2021 Glory — 2025 Will Favor This Token
body: In the 2021 crypto bull run, Dogecoin and Solana were among the biggest headline-makers. DOGE rode a meme-fueled rocket to the moon on the back of Elon Musk’s tweets and Twitter buzz. Solana surged as the so-called “Ethereum killer,” boasting lightning-fast transactions and low fees. But that was then. In 2025, the game has changed. Hype alone won’t cut it. To thrive in the coming cycle, projects must offer real utility, fresh narratives, and credible execution. And while DOGE and SOL still have name recognition, Little Pepe (LILPEPE) is emerging as the dark horse with all the right tools to dominate the next wave. Dogecoin (DOGE): Nostalgia Isn’t a Strategy DOGE is the grandfather of meme coins. It surged from fractions of a penny to over $0.70 in 2021, fueled by nothing but Twitter jokes, celebrity endorsements, and sheer momentum. However, here’s the brutal truth— DOGE still lacks an ecosystem and has seen no meaningful development upgrades in years. It relies on nostalgia and Elon Musk’s occasional shoutouts to stay relevant. It’s no wonder it has been struggling to stay above $0.20 for months. DOGE/USD 1wk Chart| TradingView Compare that to the present market, where meme coins are evolving. Investors now look for meme tokens that actually build. Little Pepe is checking all those boxes. Dogecoin, on the other hand, feels like an outdated relic from a time when “funny” was enough. Solana (SOL): From Ethereum Killer to Network Chaos Solana (SOL) had its moment of glory as a low-cost, high-speed alternative to Ethereum. In 2021, it reached a high of $260, attracting significant DeFi and NFT volume. But its rise came with serious cracks under the surface. SOL/USD 1wk Chart| TradingView Frequent network outages , concerns about centralization , and VC-dominated token allocations have marred Solana’s reputation. Although the SOL price has shown some recovery in 2024, even reaching an all-time high of $293 in January 2025, its momentum is slowing down. Solana has lost the power to rally from just a few dollars to three digits. A 2 to 5X is the most SOL can achieve as the sixth-largest cryptocurrency by market cap. 2025’s Momentum Magnet: Little Pepe (LILPEPE) If DOGE is fading and SOL is shaky, what does 2025 favor? Simple: A meme coin that’s building like a tech company, executing like a startup, and marketing like a juggernaut. Enter Little Pepe ($LILPEPE) . This isn’t just another frog-themed copycat. Little Pepe is the first meme project building its own Layer 2 blockchain, tailor-made for meme tokens. That means lightning-fast, nearly free transactions and sniper-bot resistance built into the protocol. It’s built with meme DNA but coded with Silicon Valley ambition. The roadmap includes: A “Pump Pad” launchpad for safe meme coin creation Locked liquidity and anti-rug tools for retail protection Zero team allocation (meaning less dump risk) Massive staking rewards (13.5%) for early believers A viral $777K giveaway campaign , helping to build real community traction Presale Numbers Tell the Real Story Little Pepe’s presale doesn’t lie. The project raised $777,000 on June 15 and celebrated the milestone with a $ 77,000 giveaway for ten lucky participants. Less than 24 hours later, it is a stone’s throw away from the $1 million milestone, far ahead of schedule. More than 952 million tokens out of 1.25 billion have been sold in Stage 2. The token is currently priced at $0.0011. That’s the kind of early-stage momentum that marked DOGE in 2019, but with actual utility layered in. When you add in strong tokenomics, a functional Layer 2, and a meme launchpad, you get the kind of package that VCs wish they spotted first. Here’s the math investors care about: Market cap potential: Top 100 coins average $500M–$1B LILPEPE’s early supply cap: Just $26.5B in presale terms 10x–100x returns? Not a dream. A roadmap-backed possibility. A Meme Season Unlike Any Other 2025 will mark the next phase of meme coin season, but this time, smarts beat stunts. Meme coins with real innovation will outperform hype-chasing copies. Little Pepe is launching into a red-hot narrative moment, just as influencers and retail alike are hunting for the “next DOGE” but want more than empty jokes. Meanwhile, Dogecoin and Solana’s best days are behind them. Little Pepe is the only one moving forward—building infrastructure, onboarding a cult-like community, and creating memes that make money and meaning. Conclusion: This Cycle Belongs to the Builders 2021 rewarded hype. 2025 will reward hybrid powerhouses—projects that can bring the humor and virality of memes together with real blockchain innovation. This catapults Little Pepe to the front of the line. It’s the meme infrastructure play—the Polygon of Memecoins. Don’t just buy a frog. Buy the system, and the frogs will live in it. title: Swedish Krona (SEK) Warning: BCA Predicts Aggressive Riksbank Cuts
body: BitcoinWorld Swedish Krona (SEK) Warning: BCA Predicts Aggressive Riksbank Cuts For cryptocurrency traders and investors, keeping an eye on global macroeconomics and the Forex market is crucial. Currency strength and central bank policies can significantly impact market liquidity and sentiment. Right now, a notable call is coming from BCA Research regarding the Swedish Krona (SEK) , suggesting it’s time to sell. Their reasoning? They believe the Swedish central bank, the Riksbank, is poised to cut interest rates more aggressively than most market participants currently expect. This forecast has significant implications for anyone trading or holding SEK assets. Why is BCA Bearish on the Swedish Krona (SEK)? BCA Research’s outlook on the Swedish Krona (SEK) is driven by their specific analysis of Sweden’s economic situation and the likely response from the Riksbank. They argue that the current market pricing for Riksbank interest rates does not fully reflect the economic realities facing Sweden. Several factors contribute to BCA’s bearish stance: Faster Disinflation: BCA believes that inflation in Sweden is falling more rapidly than the Riksbank’s own projections or market consensus suggest. As inflation cools, the pressure on the central bank to maintain high interest rates diminishes. Economic Weakness: Sweden’s economy has shown signs of slowing down. High household debt levels and sensitivity to interest rates make the economy vulnerable to tighter financial conditions. BCA expects this weakness to persist, necessitating monetary stimulus. Riksbank’s Mandate & Priorities: While the Riksbank targets inflation, BCA suggests that with inflation moving towards the target, the central bank will become increasingly concerned about supporting economic growth. This shift in priority could lead to more aggressive interest rate cuts . Relative Policy Stance: BCA compares the Riksbank’s likely path to that of other major central banks. They anticipate the Riksbank cutting rates faster or deeper than peers like the European Central Bank (ECB) or the Federal Reserve, making the SEK less attractive on a yield basis. Understanding the Riksbank Interest Rates Forecast The core of BCA’s argument lies in the discrepancy between their forecast for Riksbank interest rates and what the wider market is currently pricing in. Financial markets price in future rate changes based on available data and expectations. BCA’s view is that the market is underestimating the total magnitude and perhaps the speed of future interest rate cuts from the Riksbank. Let’s consider a simplified comparison of potential scenarios: Market Consensus vs. BCA Forecast for Riksbank Policy Rate While specific numbers vary and change frequently, the general idea is: Market Consensus: Expects a certain number of cuts over the next year, perhaps totalling X basis points. BCA Forecast: Expects a larger number of cuts over the same period, potentially totalling X + Y basis points (where Y is a significant additional amount). This difference in expected policy trajectory is critical for currency valuation. A central bank expected to cut rates more aggressively than its peers is likely to see its currency weaken as investors seek higher yields elsewhere. How Do Interest Rate Cuts Impact the SEK Forecast? The relationship between interest rates and currency value is a fundamental concept in the Forex market . When a central bank cuts interest rates, it generally makes the country’s currency less attractive to foreign investors who are looking for yield on their fixed-income investments (like government bonds). Here’s a breakdown of the impact on the SEK forecast : Reduced Yield Attraction: Lower interest rates mean lower returns on SEK-denominated assets. Global investors might sell SEK assets to buy assets in countries with higher interest rates, increasing the supply of SEK in the market. Capital Outflow: As investors move funds to higher-yielding markets, capital flows out of Sweden, putting downward pressure on the Swedish Krona (SEK) . Domestic Stimulus: Lower rates are intended to stimulate the domestic economy by making borrowing cheaper. While good for growth, this can also lead to increased money supply relative to demand for the currency in international markets. Relative Strength: Currency values are relative. If the Riksbank cuts rates significantly while the ECB or Fed holds steady or cuts less, the SEK weakens against the Euro and US Dollar. Therefore, BCA’s prediction of more aggressive Riksbank interest rates cuts directly translates into a negative SEK forecast from their perspective. Navigating the Forex Market: Actionable Insights for the SEK Given BCA’s analysis and the resulting negative SEK forecast , their actionable insight is straightforward: sell the Swedish Krona (SEK) . For participants in the Forex market , this typically means initiating positions that profit from a decline in the SEK’s value against other currencies. Common ways to do this include: Going Long on EUR/SEK: Buying the Euro against the Swedish Krona. If SEK weakens, this pair rises. Going Long on USD/SEK: Buying the US Dollar against the Swedish Krona. If SEK weakens, this pair rises. Going Long on GBP/SEK: Buying the British Pound against the Swedish Krona. If SEK weakens, this pair rises. It’s important to remember that trading in the Forex market involves risk. While BCA’s analysis provides a potential trading thesis based on expected Riksbank interest rates policy, market movements can be influenced by numerous other factors, including global risk sentiment, geopolitical events, and unexpected economic data releases. Potential Challenges to BCA’s View: The Riksbank could prove more hawkish than BCA expects, perhaps reacting strongly to any signs of inflation persistence or currency weakness itself. Global economic conditions might improve faster than anticipated, reducing the need for aggressive stimulus. Market consensus on Riksbank interest rates could quickly shift to align with BCA’s view, causing the SEK to weaken rapidly before traders can establish positions. Unexpected positive data from the Swedish economy could alter the Riksbank’s trajectory. Traders should always conduct their own research and consider risk management strategies, such as setting stop-loss orders, when acting on any market forecast. Summary: The BCA Call on the Swedish Krona (SEK) In conclusion, BCA Research presents a compelling case for a weaker Swedish Krona (SEK) . Their analysis hinges on the belief that the Riksbank will implement more substantial interest rate cuts than the market currently anticipates, driven by faster disinflation and a need to support a slowing economy. This divergence in expected Riksbank interest rates policy is seen as a key driver for the SEK forecast , making the currency less attractive relative to peers in the global Forex market . While their call to sell SEK offers a clear directional bias, market participants should remain aware of the inherent risks and potential counter-arguments to this forecast. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping interest rates and currency forecasts. This post Swedish Krona (SEK) Warning: BCA Predicts Aggressive Riksbank Cuts first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Jupiter DAO will pause all voting, closing the Treasury until 2027
body: The Jupiter DEX and aggregator, one of the most widely used routers on Solana, announced it would pause JUP voting until the end of 2025. The platform cited ‘community fatigue’ as the main reason to stop voting on issues. Jupiter will pause voting using JUP tokens , citing community fatigue. No new proposals will be opened until the end of 2025. For Jupiter, voting was one of the main community activities and use cases for the native JUP token. The community had both high-profile votes like the Jupuary airdrop, and regular small-scale issues. Jupiter team member @kashdhanda announced that the Jupiter DAO will pause voting to shift focus to development. Pausing DAO Voting to Focus on Jupiter & Jupiverse @JupiterExchange stands at the edge of an inflection point. The window to define the future of DeFi is open, but it won’t stay open for long. Right now, we have the best product suite (Jup dot ag), the best community… — Kash (🐱, 🐐) (@kashdhanda) June 19, 2025 Jupiter is one of the busiest community projects, while also carrying a wide array of Web3 and DeFi products. The team believes Jupiter can focus on building and generating revenues, for now, leaving the work of the DAO on pause. The Jupiter ecosystem contains multiple types of stakeholders, ranging from whales to retail users. Recently, the most significant growth came from the Jupiter DEX, which already holds over $2.27B in value locked. Jupiter DEX already produces $1.6M in daily fees, with over $17M for the past month. The market’s activity has slowed down since March, due to competition from Raydium, PumpSwap, and other Solana DEXs, but showed signs of recovery in June. Currently, Jupiter DEX brings in over 18K daily traders, performing up to 80K swaps. Most of the activity for the Jupiter aggregator comes from SolFi, OpenBook V2, Orca, and Meteora, with just 0.3% of traffic from Pump.fun. However, the past two months saw an outflow of both old and returning users, as the Jupiter aggregator lost up to 60% of its active wallets. Jupiter DEX lost some of its market share to PumpSwap, through still remaining competitive with other Solana-based exchanges. | Source: Dune Analytics Jupiter DEX currently carries around 7.8% of Solana DEX traffic, displaced by PumpSwap with over 65% of meme token volumes. The automatic shift of meme tokens to PumpSwap also meant a lower need for the aggregator, as the meme tokens were consolidated on a single market. Jupiter will rebuild DAO governance in 2026 Governance for Jupiter DAO will return in 2026 with a new structure. Previously, votes on Jupuary airdrops have arrived with significant conflicts and market panic. The Jupuary event led to clashes of multiple holder classes, including new users and older whales. The Jupiter platform will aim to bring a period of building and focusing on DeFi, while rebuilding the voting rules. The freeze in voting will also mean no new JUP emissions for voting rewards and incentives. JUP only expects another big dilution event when 700M tokens will be airdropped in the second part of the Jupuary event. The DAO Treasury, also known as the Litterbox Trust, will remain closed until 2027, while continuing to receive revenues from jupSOL staking. Active staking will remain and distribute 50M JUP for active staking, even with no voting issues. Workgroup budgets will also be closed, and no new JUP minting will be proposed. The removal of voting incentives may also ease selling pressure on JUP. The native token traded near its yearly lows of $0.40. title: Story (IP) Price Plunges While Trading Volume Spikes Over 200%; What’s Going On?
body: The post Story (IP) Price Plunges While Trading Volume Spikes Over 200%; What’s Going On? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News In the fast-paced world of crypto, few things stir the pot like a sudden surge in trading volume. Story (IP), a token designed to revolutionize intellectual property on the blockchain, is currently grabbing headlines after its 24-hour trading volume spiked by over 200%, reaching $64.5 million. So what’s driving this unexpected action—and is it just noise or the start of something bigger? Story Protocol’s volume increase isn’t subtle—it’s a dramatic move that has caught the attention of traders and analysts alike. Over the past 24 hours, trading activity has increased significantly after being relatively modest just a day ago. This kind of spike typically signals either a wave of new buyers entering the market, whale activity or large-scale transactions. But why is IP Price Dropping? Here’s the interesting part: despite the volume surge, Story’s price is actually dropping. This is often a red flag for distribution—a phase where big holders sell into increasing demand. It may also reflect a sell-off after a recent pump, profit-taking by early investors, token unlock events or upcoming milestones. Technically, high volume combined with a falling price suggests bearish pressure. So what’s next for the IP price rally? The momentum of the price is still very bearish as the RSI has dropped and entered the oversold range. This confirms the bearish dominance, which could keep the price consolidated within the lower range of the descending parallel channel. This suggests the price is now heading towards the support of the channel around $2 and further triggering a rebound. If not, the Story price may discover new bottoms. The recent surge in volume but drop in price is a mixed signal for traders. On one hand, it shows strong market interest, while on the other hand, it could mean smart money is exiting while retail interest spikes. Hence, the Story (IP) price is believed to squeeze off all the shorts and trigger a strong upswing.

title: EUR/CHF: UBS Reveals Aggressive Strategy Buying Dips Below 0.93
body: BitcoinWorld EUR/CHF: UBS Reveals Aggressive Strategy Buying Dips Below 0.93 While the cryptocurrency market often grabs headlines with its volatility, savvy investors understand the importance of looking at diverse opportunities across the financial landscape. The traditional Forex market , for instance, continues to present intriguing scenarios driven by institutional moves. One such development drawing attention is UBS , a major global financial institution, reportedly taking a specific stance on the EUR/CHF currency pair. Why is UBS Targeting the EUR/CHF Pair Below 0.93? The EUR/CHF pair represents the exchange rate between the Euro and the Swiss Franc . Its movement is influenced by economic conditions, monetary policies from the European Central Bank (ECB) and the Swiss National Bank (SNB), and global risk sentiment. The level of 0.93 appears to be identified by UBS as a significant support zone or a level where the pair becomes fundamentally undervalued based on their analysis. Institutional players like UBS conduct extensive research into macroeconomic indicators, interest rate differentials, inflation outlooks, and political stability to determine their trading strategies. Their decision to buy dips below 0.93 suggests a conviction that the factors pushing the pair lower are temporary or that the fundamental value warrants a higher price over their investment horizon. Key considerations for this stance might include: Analysis of SNB’s recent policy shifts or forward guidance. Assessment of the Eurozone’s economic resilience. Evaluation of the Swiss Franc ‘s role as a safe-haven currency during periods of market stress. Internal modeling predicting potential mean reversion or upward price correction. What Does UBS’s Strategy Signal for the Broader Forex Market? When a major institution like UBS takes a clear position, it often sends a signal to the wider Forex market . Institutional order flow can create significant support or resistance levels. UBS’s reported activity suggests a potential floor around the 0.93 level, at least in the short to medium term, as their buying interest may absorb selling pressure. This can influence other market participants in several ways: Validation: It might validate similar analyses from other institutions or sophisticated retail traders who also see value at or below this level. Order Flow: Their actual buying creates demand for the pair, which can help stabilize or push prices higher from the targeted level. Sentiment: Knowledge of a major player buying can improve market sentiment towards the EUR/CHF pair at these lower levels. However, it’s crucial to remember that even large institutions can be wrong, and market conditions can change rapidly. Following institutional trades blindly without understanding the underlying reasons or having your own analysis is risky. How Can Currency Trading Strategies Incorporate This Insight? For those involved in currency trading , UBS’s reported activity offers a potential point of interest. Understanding where large players are positioning themselves can be a valuable piece of the puzzle, but it should complement, not replace, your own trading strategy and risk management. Potential approaches based on this information could include: Dip Buying Confirmation: If your own analysis suggests buying the EUR/CHF pair, UBS’s activity below 0.93 could serve as a form of confirmation, suggesting institutional support in that area. Looking for Entry Points: Traders might look for price action signals (like bullish candlestick patterns or bounces off support) around the 0.93 level to consider long positions. Setting Stop Losses: The 0.93 level could potentially be used in conjunction with technical analysis to help determine appropriate stop-loss levels, perhaps just below the institutional buying zone to limit potential losses if the level fails. Actionable Insight: Always combine institutional insights with your own technical and fundamental analysis. Consider the 0.93 level as an area of potential interest where institutional demand might emerge, but be prepared for the possibility that the market could break below it if conditions change significantly. Understanding the Swiss Franc’s Role in the EUR/CHF Dynamic The Swiss Franc (CHF) is often seen as a safe-haven currency, meaning it tends to strengthen during times of global economic uncertainty or market turmoil. This is partly due to Switzerland’s stable political environment, strong economy, and the SNB’s sound monetary policy historically. The performance of the Swiss Franc significantly impacts the EUR/CHF pair. If global risks increase, demand for the CHF can rise, causing the pair to fall. Conversely, if risk appetite returns, the CHF may weaken, allowing the pair to rise. The SNB’s stance on interest rates and foreign exchange interventions also plays a critical role. Recent SNB rate cuts, for example, can make the CHF less attractive relative to the Euro, potentially supporting the EUR/CHF pair. UBS’s decision to buy below 0.93 likely incorporates their view on the future path of the Swiss Franc relative to the Euro, considering both monetary policy expectations and potential shifts in global risk sentiment. Is UBS’s Position on EUR/CHF a Guaranteed Win? Challenges and Risks No trade in the Forex market is without risk, even for institutions like UBS . While their resources and analysis are significant, they are not infallible. Several factors could challenge their position: Unexpected Economic Data: Poor economic reports from the Eurozone or unexpectedly strong data from Switzerland could shift the balance. Sudden Policy Changes: Unforeseen monetary policy decisions by the ECB or SNB could dramatically impact the pair. Global Shocks: A major global event (like a financial crisis or geopolitical conflict) could trigger a strong safe-haven bid for the Swiss Franc , pushing the pair well below 0.93. Market Liquidity: While EUR/CHF is a major pair, liquidity can sometimes be a factor, especially during volatile moves. Understanding these challenges is vital for anyone considering a trade based on institutional activity. Risk management, including setting stop losses and managing position size, is paramount in currency trading . Conclusion: What UBS’s EUR/CHF Stance Means for Traders UBS buying dips in EUR/CHF below 0.93 highlights a specific institutional perspective on the value of this currency pair. It suggests that a major player sees the area around 0.93 as an attractive level to accumulate long positions, potentially indicating a belief that the pair will appreciate. For participants in the Forex market and those engaged in currency trading , this information can be a useful data point. It underscores the importance of analyzing institutional flow and key price levels. However, success in currency trading ultimately depends on having a well-defined strategy, conducting independent analysis of factors affecting the Euro and the Swiss Franc , and rigorously applying risk management principles. While following institutional footsteps can be insightful, it requires careful consideration and integration into your own trading framework. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping currency trading liquidity. title: Ethereum strategic reserves hit 1% of supply as corporate adoption accelerates
body: Top institutional holders dominate Ethereum’s strategic reserves, with the Ethereum Foundation leading the pack. Corporate Bitcoin (BTC) strategic reserves have been a major trend in the past few months. However, Ethereum (ETH) is slowly catching up. On June 19, strategic reserves among institutions rose to 1.190 million ETH , according to the Strategic ETH Reserve website. These reserves, worth almost $3 billion, amount to more than 1% of the total supply of ETH. The growth of ETH strategic reserves | Source: Strategic ETH Reserve Top holders dominate these reserves, with the five largest entities controlling over 70% of all institutional ETH holdings. The Ethereum Foundation is the single largest holder, with 269,431 ETH. It’s followed by SharpLink, a Nasdaq-listed gaming company that acquired 176,271 ETH on June 13 and has staked 95% of it. The Nasdaq-listed firm acquired its reserves on June 13 and is staking 95% of the ETH. The most recent entrant is Status, an Ethereum messenger and Wallet, which acquired 23,066 ETH on June 19, worth $2.9 million. Entities holding the most Ethereum strategic reserves | Source: Strategic ETH Reserve Other significant holders include layer-1 network PulseChain, crypto exchange Coinbase, and the Ethereum-focused Golem Foundation. Notably, the U.S. government also holds close to 60,000 ETH, largely originating from asset seizures. Read more: Ethereum whale buys $127m in ETH during dip, sparking bullish sentiment More firms consider ETH reserves While Bitcoin remains the leading asset for strategic reserves, Ethereum is attracting growing interest from corporations and government entities. As the most established altcoin, it is emerging as the top choice beyond Bitcoin. Among them, Michigan’s state pension plan made a $10 million allocation in Ethereum. Publicly traded companies that hold Ethereum include Bit Digital, BTCS, Intchains Group, and KR1, firms that are mostly focused on crypto assets. The figures come from the Strategic ETH Reserve initiative, which tracks major institutional holders through publicly visible wallets. The initiative aims to promote transparency and drive broader adoption of Ethereum in institutional portfolios. You might also like: Pro: Ethereum, Solana key to crypto reserve

title: Chainlink Eyes $260 Trillion Untokenized Assets Market – Can LINK Hit $30 on CCIP Success?
body: Chainlink has positioned itself at the center of a potential $260 trillion market opportunity as the blockchain oracle network accelerates partnerships with major financial institutions to unlock the massive untokenized assets market through its Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol (CCIP). The scope of Chainlink’s strategy became evident through recent high-profile collaborations, including a pilot with UBS Asset Management and Swift for tokenized fund settlements, a comprehensive partnership with Abu Dhabi Global Market to develop blockchain standards, and integration with World Liberty Financial’s DeFi ecosystem . Chainlink is the only platform that delivers the essential… Data Cross-chain Legacy system connectivity Compliance …to unlock the utility of digital assets throughout their entire lifecycle. Thank you, Secretary Bessent, for your leadership in driving U.S. digital asset… https://t.co/XXIodIXXPg pic.twitter.com/BYtkecuK1c — Chainlink (@chainlink) June 18, 2025 Chainlink has evolved beyond simple data feeds to become the essential infrastructure for connecting traditional financial systems with blockchain networks. Source: Chainlink It now processes over $22 trillion in transactions while establishing the technical foundation needed to bring real-world assets on-chain at a large scale. All these key partnerships and developments have created a network effect that could exponentially accelerate the migration of traditional assets onto blockchain infrastructure. From Pilot Programs to Production: The Institutional Tokenization Adoption Trend Chainlink’s methodical approach to institutional partnerships has evolved from experimental pilots to production-ready implementations that show the practical viability of blockchain technology for traditional finance operations. In late 2024, the UBS Asset Management and Swift collaboration showed that tokenized fund subscriptions and redemptions could operate seamlessly within existing financial infrastructure while reducing operational costs and settlement delays that plague the $63 trillion global mutual fund market. This pilot’s success under Singapore’s Project Guardian framework has also established a replicable model that other major asset managers are now evaluating for their own tokenization initiatives. We’re excited to announce that @ADGlobalMarket —Abu Dhabi’s premier international financial center—and Chainlink have forged an alliance. The alliance will maximize the utility of tokenized assets in the UAE while ensuring regulatory compliance. https://t.co/oYwl96NSXI pic.twitter.com/OpJ4CCW5wP — Chainlink (@chainlink) March 24, 2025 More recently, the partnership with Abu Dhabi Global Market extends Chainlink’s reach into regulated environments, where compliance and technical standards must perfectly align with traditional finance requirements. ADGM’s robust regulatory framework for tokenization projects provides the legal certainty that major institutions require before committing substantial resources to blockchain adoption. The collaboration allows ADGM’s Registration Authority to leverage Chainlink’s technical services for tokenized assets while ensuring full regulatory compliance. It creates a template for similar partnerships with other international financial centers seeking to establish themselves as blockchain innovation hubs. XSwap ( @xswap_link ) is a cross-chain platform powered by Chainlink CCIP, enabling users to securely navigate the multi-chain ecosystem from a single interface. See how it works ↓ https://t.co/bnb6YXzCnA — Chainlink (@chainlink) June 17, 2025 The success of these pilots has created momentum for scaling tokenization efforts across the broader financial services industry. Each successful implementation reduces resistance to adoption among traditionally conservative institutional players. LINK Technical Analysis Points to Breakout Potential From a technical perspective, Chainlink’s chart structure presents a compelling setup. The 4-hour chart reveals a classic descending triangle pattern with LINK currently positioned at the apex where descending resistance converges with horizontal support around $13.186. Source: Cola-Signals on TradingView This technical formation often resolves with explosive moves when breaking to the upside, particularly when accompanied by strong fundamental drivers like the massive total addressable market Chainlink targets. The most encouraging aspect of the technical setup is the robust defense of the $12.442–$13.186 support zone through multiple tests. The blue arrow projection targets $26.094, representing a doubling from current levels based on measuring the triangle’s height and projecting it upward from the breakout point. This target aligns closely with previous resistance levels, suggesting the market has identified this zone as a realistic objective given Chainlink’s expanding role in the tokenization ecosystem. The weekly timeframe also provides even more compelling evidence for a major bullish move, with LINK consolidating within a large symmetrical triangle following its peak around $29 in late 2024. Momentum indicators show bullish divergence, with price forming lower highs while the oscillator is trending higher and recently broke above its bearish phase. This weekly divergence pattern is particularly powerful as it often precedes major trend reversals or large breakout moves, suggesting that LINK is building energy for a substantial advance. The convergence of multiple moving averages around current price levels indicates a major directional decision point approaching. Any breakout above the $15–16 resistance zone could trigger a measured move toward $20–25 initially. The ultimate target could extend back toward previous highs near $29–$30 if the tokenization thesis gains traction and Chainlink successfully captures meaningful market share from the $260 trillion untokenized assets opportunity. Overall, the technical structure suggests that while near-term volatility remains possible, the longer-term setup strongly favors a bullish resolution. The post Chainlink Eyes $260 Trillion Untokenized Assets Market – Can LINK Hit $30 on CCIP Success? appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Solana, XRP, and ADA All Rebound, But the Fed's Rate Decision Casts a Shadow: What's the Forecast for July?
body: Cryptocurrencies Solana , XRP , and ADA are seeing a surge in value. However, economic decisions by the Federal Reserve are looming, causing uncertainty in the market. What lies ahead for these digital assets in July? This article delves into potential growth and the factors that could influence their trajectories. SOL Market Update - Testing Key Support and Resistance Levels Solana experienced a notable decline in recent months with a one-month drop of about 12% and a six-month fall of nearly 25%. The coin traded within a range of $136 to $182 while weekly losses hit around 9%. Indicators showed negative pressure with the Awesome Oscillator at -11.258 and the Momentum Indicator at -14.83. The Relative Strength Index lingered at 41.33, reflecting a trend consistently below neutral. Price action over the past weeks points to a bearish phase, with downward momentum dominating the session. The patterns suggest that the sell-off has kept the market in a corrective mode. Current price activity centers around key technical levels. The nearest support stands at $115.84 with a secondary support level near $69.81, while resistance levels are marked at $207.90 and a higher barrier at $253.93. The market shows a cautious bear sentiment as prices struggle to break beyond the lower resistance zone. Traders may consider buy opportunities near support levels for a short-term rebound or short positions near resistance if the price fails to maintain upward momentum. Monitoring price action around these levels is crucial for deciding entries and exits, while also paying attention to momentum changes and volume shifts. XRP Price Analysis: Navigating Key Levels Amid Price Declines XRP experienced a 9.13% drop over the last month and a 4.98% decline over the past six months. The coin’s performance has been under pressure, with price trends showing a steady decrease amid minor short-term recoveries. Indicators such as the Awesome Oscillator, Momentum Indicator, and RSI have reflected muted momentum and negative bias. The price action highlights a market with limited buying strength and persistent selling pressure. Historical data reveals that XRP has struggled to maintain its previous highs, leading to cautious trading behavior. Price corrections have pointed to the potential for further adjustments driven by market sentiment and trading volumes. The current trading environment finds XRP cycling within a defined range between $1.95 and $2.53. Immediate support lies near $1.73 while resistance stands at approximately $2.88. This setup shows that bearish influence is more pronounced than bullish sentiment, as several indicators suggest downward pressure. There is also a second layer of trading levels with lower support around $1.15 and upper resistance near $3.45. While some traders observe short-term fluctuations, the lack of a clear trend allows for sideways movement within these key boundaries. Buyers might consider entering near the lower support, targeting quick exits near resistance. Conversely, sellers could seek profits if the price fails to break above $2.88. Cardano Market Overview: Recent Declines and Key Trading Levels Cardano experienced a 1-month drop of nearly 19% and a 6-month decrease of about 36.5%. A 1-week decline of 13.63% highlighted short-term weakness, with price action settling within a corridor between $0.5967 and $0.8187. This range reflects reduced buying interest. The Awesome Oscillator stood at -0.0769 and the Momentum Indicator at -0.103, while the RSI of 33.378 indicates oversold conditions. Recommendations from the summary, moving average, and oscillators remain negative. Overall, significant declines and a lack of robust upward momentum suggest that the market is in retreat, struggling to breach previous resistance levels. Current market levels place Cardano between $0.5967 and $0.8187. Immediate resistance is observed at $0.9523, with support at $0.5083. A higher resistance exists at $1.1743, while deeper support is near $0.2863. Technical indicators show a bearish outlook, and the price behavior does not indicate a strong upward trend, with bears dominating the trading environment. Any bounce from $0.5083 may present a short-term buying opportunity if sellers don't push prices lower. Conversely, a move beyond $0.9523 could lead short-term traders to exit for profit-taking. Further declines below support could extend toward $0.2863. Traders should act cautiously, focusing on entry and exit points within the established range. Conclusion SOL , XRP , and ADA have all shown signs of recovery. Their performance remains under scrutiny as the Fed's upcoming rate decision looms. The economic environment may heavily influence market movements. Investors should keep an eye on this decision for potential impacts on these coins. Predictions for July remain cautious, as market dynamics could shift based on the Fed's policies. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: Units.Network Accelerates Growth with $10M Funding for AI and Infrastructure
body: BitcoinWorld Units.Network Accelerates Growth with $10M Funding for AI and Infrastructure The intersection of Artificial Intelligence and blockchain technology is rapidly becoming a hotbed for innovation. Leading this charge is Units.Network, a burgeoning ecosystem built on the robust Waves Protocol, which has just announced a significant boost to its development efforts. The network successfully closed a substantial blockchain funding round, securing a remarkable $10 million. What Does Units.Network Do and Why Does This Funding Matter? Units.Network is positioning itself as a key player within the Waves Protocol ecosystem. The protocol itself is known for its focus on user-friendly dApp development and scalable blockchain solutions. Units.Network aims to further enhance this ecosystem by building tools and infrastructure that make interacting with and building on blockchain technology more accessible and efficient. This recent blockchain funding round, led by Nimbus Capital as reported by Tech in Asia, is a powerful indicator of investor confidence in Units.Network’s vision and its potential to drive adoption and innovation within the space. Securing $10 million is a significant milestone for any project, especially in the current market climate. This capital infusion provides Units.Network with the necessary resources to accelerate its ambitious development roadmap, particularly focusing on integrating cutting-edge technologies like Artificial Intelligence and strengthening its core infrastructure. It signals a belief that Units.Network has the potential to deliver valuable solutions that address current needs in the decentralized world. Powering the Future: AI in Crypto and Units.Network’s Vision One of the most exciting aspects of Units.Network’s plans is its deep dive into integrating AI in crypto operations. The funding is specifically earmarked to support the development of powerful, AI-powered tools designed to enhance user experience and developer capabilities within the ecosystem. This move aligns with a growing trend across the industry, where projects are exploring how AI can bring automation, efficiency, and intelligence to decentralized applications and protocols. Units.Network is reportedly focusing on developing specific Crypto AI Tools , including: AI Launchpad: While details are still emerging, an AI Launchpad could potentially revolutionize how projects are initiated and managed on the blockchain. Imagine a tool that uses AI to help developers write smart contracts, optimize tokenomics, predict potential issues, or even automate parts of the deployment process. This could significantly lower the barrier to entry for new projects and increase the quality and security of launches within the Units.Network and Waves Protocol ecosystem. Liquidity Manager: Managing liquidity across various decentralized exchanges (DEXs) and protocols is a complex task. An AI-powered Liquidity Manager could use sophisticated algorithms to analyze market conditions, predict price movements, and automatically optimize liquidity provision strategies for users and projects. This could lead to more efficient capital allocation, reduced slippage, and improved trading experiences within the ecosystem. The integration of these Crypto AI Tools highlights Units.Network’s commitment to leveraging advanced technology to solve real-world problems in the blockchain space. By making these sophisticated capabilities available, they aim to create a more intelligent, automated, and user-friendly decentralized environment. Beyond AI: Strengthening the Core Infrastructure While AI in crypto is a major focus, the $10 million in blockchain funding will also be used to bolster the fundamental infrastructure of Units.Network. A robust and scalable infrastructure is crucial for supporting growth and ensuring the reliability of the network. Key areas of infrastructure enhancement include: Boosting Validator Capacity: Validators are essential for securing the network and processing transactions. Increasing validator capacity means the network can handle a higher volume of transactions more efficiently and maintain greater stability, even under heavy load. This is vital for scaling the Units.Network ecosystem and supporting a growing number of users and applications. Enhancing Cross-Chain Liquidity: In today’s multi-chain world, the ability to seamlessly move assets and data between different blockchains is paramount. Enhanced cross-chain liquidity solutions will make it easier for users and projects within Units.Network to interact with other blockchain networks, increasing interoperability and expanding the potential reach and utility of the ecosystem. These infrastructure improvements, funded by the recent investment, are foundational to the long-term success of Units.Network. They ensure that as the network grows and integrates advanced features like Crypto AI Tools , it remains performant, secure, and interconnected with the broader blockchain landscape. What Does This Mean for the Future? The successful blockchain funding round for Units.Network marks a significant step forward. It validates their approach of combining the established foundation of the Waves Protocol with innovative advancements in AI in crypto . The development of sophisticated Crypto AI Tools and the strengthening of core infrastructure are poised to make the Units.Network ecosystem more powerful, efficient, and accessible. For developers, this could mean more intelligent tools to build next-generation dApps. For users, it could translate to smoother experiences, optimized trading, and access to a more robust network. As Units.Network moves forward with implementing its plans, the crypto community will be watching closely to see how these AI-powered tools and infrastructure enhancements shape the future of the Waves Protocol ecosystem and contribute to the broader adoption of blockchain technology. To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping blockchain funding and AI in crypto. title: Monero price prediction 2025-2031: Should you buy XMR now?
body: Key takeaways: Monero price prediction suggests a bullish trend, with XMR anticipated to reach $722.59 by the end of 2025. XMR could reach a maximum price of $1,501.34 by the end of 2028. By 2031, Monero’s price may surge to $2,445.93. Monero (XMR) stands out in the cryptocurrency space for its strong focus on privacy and decentralization of transactions, making it one of the leading privacy focused cryptocurrencies. This makes it a popular choice for privacy advocates and those prioritizing security. The Monero ecosystem constantly evolves, marked by significant milestones like enhanced protocol upgrades and growing adoption across various sectors, which underscore its utility. As Monero progresses, many wonder about its future price trajectory. Will its unique features drive significant value growth, as many traders speculate? Can it sustain its competitive edge in the ever-evolving crypto market? Will XMR recapture its ATH at $517.62 in the long term forecast? Overview Cryptocurrency Monero Token XMR Price $315.49 (-1.7%) Market Cap $5.82 Billion Trading Volume (24-hour) $82.9 Million Circulating Supply 18,446,744.07 XMR All-time High $517.62 May 07, 2021 All-time Low $0.213, Jan 15, 2015 24-h High $323.28 24-h Low $314.10 Monero price prediction: Technical analysis Sentiment Bearish 50-Day SMA $330.55 200-Day SMA $241.36 Price Prediction $676.26 (114.99%) F & G Index 10.34 (extreme fear) Green Days 15/30 (50%) 14-Day RSI 36.40 Monero price analysis TL;DR Breakdown Monero price shows a bearish trend toward $320 The XMR coin fell by over 4.5% at the time of writing. Monero price has support and resistance at $317 and $390, respectively. The Monero price analysis for June 19 shows declining volatility as XMR price consolidates above the $310 price level. Monero price analysis 1-day chart: XMR falls towards $300 after rejection at $400 The 24-hour XMR/USD price chart indicates a mixed market sentiment as the altcoin observes an increase of more than 65% of its value in the last few days as XMR rose from the $220 price level to the $400 mark. However, after reaching the $400 mark, the price crashed sharply to the $310 level where it has traded for the past few days. XMR Price 1-day chart The indicators reflect the decreasing bearish price sentiment, as all three major technical indicators show positive signs. The MACD is bearish at -2.01 units and shows rising bullish pressure at the current price level. The RSI also shares this sentiment as it stabilized toward 43.89 level suggesting room for further movement in either direction. The converging Bollinger Bands suggest lower volatility, indicating that the $310 support may hold for the week. Monero price analysis 4-hour chart The 4-hour price chart shows that Monero spiked toward the $364 mark as buyers intensified their domination. Currently, they’re maintaining the price momentum key support at $310. Monero price analysis 4-hour chart The RSI is at 45.06, suggesting bearish momentum as the price falls back towards the $310 mark.
